snippet.title: End of Lines — Teaser
snippet.description:
Add End of Lines to your wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1658960/End_of_Lines/

Official website: http://endoflines.nova-box.com
Follow the devs on Twitter: https://twitter.com/novabox
Or Facebook: https://facebook.com/novabox.studio

Voice-over by Armand “AJ” Jennings.

End of Lines is an interactive graphic novel for PC/Mac/Linux & Nintendo Switch.

Following a climate-induced apocalypse, a group of survivors center around a small nuclear family wanders in the devastated countryside of Southern Europe, looking for an livable place to settle.

A well-researched, environmental tale that acts as a warning about climate inaction and the collapse of ecosystems.
